headline: Spotting Winners: Microchip Technology (NASDAQ:MCHP) And Analog Semiconductors Stocks In Q3
summary: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how analog semiconductors stocks fared in Q3, starting with Microchip Technology (NASDAQ:MCHP).

raw.headline: Spotting Winners: Microchip Technology (NASDAQ:MCHP) And Analog Semiconductors Stocks In Q3

headline: Microchip Technology (MCHP): Reassessing Valuation After Outlook Upgrade and New Power Monitor Launch
summary: Microchip Technology (MCHP) just gave investors a one two boost by tightening its December quarter outlook to the high end of prior guidance and rolling out ultra efficient digital power monitors for several fast growing end markets. See our latest analysis for Microchip Technology. The guidance hike and fresh product launch helped snap a recent lull, with Microchip’s 7 day share price return of 20.79% lifting year to date gains to 13.78%, even as the 3 year total shareholder return remains...
